column2: Double-click to listen to the final messages from Vlast. Not usable in instances.
You'll now be granted swiftness and protection after getting knocked off your mount, or after engaging foes with Barrel Roll. (Cooldown: 10s)
Double-click to summon this mini to follow you around. Only one mini may be in use at a time.

Double-click to teleport to the Chalon Docks in the Domain of Istan. <c=@Warning>This item cannot be used while in combat.</c>

Press to mount the springer or to dismount your current ride.
All mounts now receive the bonus from Nimble Recovery. Getting knocked off your mount or engaging foes will grant swiftness and protection. (Cooldown: 10s)
Maintain peace and order in the corsair flotilla.
New griffon adventures are now available to test your skills!

Enclosed is your allotted share of the goods procured by our hunters. Another shipment will be sent tomorrow. You can always change your orders at your Black Lion Acquisitions Board.

—Black Lion Acquisitions
The hover movement ability now hovers at a much greater height.

Your short bow skills now pierce. Bleeding you inflict deals more damage.

Loot library keys from roaming demons and use them to open chests holding the lost Sunspear writings.
The springer will now have a greater tolerance to taking fall damage, allowing you to safely fall from higher locations.
The leap movement ability will now travel much farther distances.
Prove your mastery of the Elon Riverlands griffons.
Regain endurance when you kill a foe.
Grants a large amount of experience.
The Black Lion Hunters Board has been installed in your home instance.
Purchase this relic from Tendaji in Desert Highlands.

The springer's charged jump movement ability will now be able to jump much higher distances.

Double-click to apply this look to any other axe. This will also unlock this skin for your wardrobe.
<c=@flavor>Legend says that only the most dedicated smith could withstand the elements for the decade it took to craft this axe and its rival.</c>

Tail Spin now deals greatly increased damage to foes.

Long ago, the four great pirate crews of Istan cast aside their petty squabbles, forging an old-fashioned accord that stands to this day: on our flotilla, we're all part of the same crew. Now it ain't easy, and it ain't perfect, but it works. Sometimes.

You helped us keep the peace on our little floating paradise, and for that, I'll always think of ye as an honorary member of our corsair crew.

—Shipmate Hadhi
